items.content_html: idbkeyvalue is a lightweight npm package that simplifies working with IndexedDB. It provides a straightforward API for performing key-value operations in client-side databases, including opening databases, inserting, updating, retrieving, and deleting data. Ideal for web applications needing efficient local data storage and management.
items.title: shivrajansingh/idbkeyvalue: idbkeyvalue is a lightweight npm package that simplifies working with IndexedDB. It provides a straightforward API for performing key-value operations in client-side databases, including opening databases, inserting, updating, retrieving, and deleting data. Ideal for web applications needing efficient local data storage and management.
